name: Fashion recognition with Neural Networks
description: This badge is awarded to Summer School students who have undertaken a set of activities around fashion recognition with neural networks as part of the Introduction to Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Workshop.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of attendance

criteria.narrative: To earn this badge students must have achieved the following: The preparation of fashion data; Normalises the data between the value [0,1]; Introduction to training data; Using feedforward neural network; Work through the notebook that defines, compiles and trains a model; Experiment with tuning the model
